data.text: @SenGaryPeters These people are getting paid for this bridge. They sold out michigan to enrich themselves.

@SenGaryPeters I think the president is correct.  This can be a major asset for Michigan, but is it fully evaluated for the full potential?  Apparently his team took a look and it can be better.   You should not be afraid to do the same.  Is it true they fully own the bridge?

@SenGaryPeters Congratulations on showing everyone you value taxes and kickbacks over the people. 
Your complete lack of understanding is also fun, but we all knew that already.
@stcyrbrigitte @SenGaryPeters We don’t give a shit Karen

@SenGaryPeters Update per NYT: Moroun met Lutnick hours before DJT's rant about the #GordieHoweBridge. 
https://t.co/TAsJJDNKEe
@SenGaryPeters Rubberstamp peters !!!! It does what its told...you helped screw americans...retire asap...go into hiding..
@Jedger007 @SenGaryPeters the beauty of this tweet is it has inexhaustible application to just about every topic on planet Earth
@SenGaryPeters Doesn't matter any more. Canada is done dealing with the US idiocracy that occupies the Whitehouse.
